# Enhanced Security

**Property List Key**

The entitlement required for an executable to opt in to enhanced security protections.

## Discussion

Set this entitlement’s value to `1` to adopt the current version of enhanced security protections in your app or extension. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/enabling-enhanced-security-for-your-app].

## Hardened process

- **Hardened Process**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the executable opts in to additional security checks.
- **Hardened Heap**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the process opts in to type-aware memory allocations.
- **Additional Runtime Platform Restrictions**: An integer value that indicates the level of additional runtime security protections your app or extension opts in to.
- **Enable Read-Only Platform Memory**: An entitlement that marks memory used for internal platform state as read-only.
